overview: For Paul, Kevin Young was the hottest hunk he'd ever seen in the pages of a Stud Magazine. At that moment, unbeknown to him, his dream boy is having car problems down the road... and you guessed it, he's about to cum knocking on Paul's door. Also staring Tim Lowe, in a non-stop cornucopia of hard bodies and sweaty action! Hot!
title: Bare Bottoms
